pr_title: DB-10187 add base_name, base_schema to sysibm.systables

timeline.message: DB-10187 add base_name, base_schema to sysibm.systables

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible in splice for now that BASE_NAME and BASE_SCHEMA are not null?
timeline.author: ascend1

replies.bodyText: Base_name and base_schema are only meaningful for alias/synonym that points to a table/view/alias, which refer to the base table/view/alias and the schema the referred object resides in. Splice currently does not have these two columns directly, but the relevant info are in the sys.sysaliases table in the column aliasinfo. For other database objects, these two fields are not applicable, so they should stay as NULL.
replies.author: yxia92
